there are several techniques to do this my personal favorite is the magic loop link - https //verypink com/ 2012/10/17/simple-magic-loop/ you can also use two circular needles many video tutorials online here is one link - https //www youtube com/watch v=1pmxrdz-cwo if you don t want to do jmco see construction notes construction notes petals are worked separately make 5 then they are cinched together beads are sewn onto middle of joined petals then leaves actually partial leaves are made separately and sewn on behind the petals i tried doing french knots instead of beads for the center of the flower but mine looked awful so went with beads instead i imagine you could also use tiny dome shaped buttons casting on for the petals -
